en.name: Unity Tactical FAST Micro Mount, 2.26
en.description: The Unity Tactical FAST(tm) is a series of optic mounts and platforms that provide end users with a quicker sight picture than standard height mounts.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST Micro Mount, 2.26 (FDE)
en.description: The Unity Tactical FAST(tm) is a series of optic mounts and platforms that provide end users with a quicker sight picture than standard height mounts.

en.name: GBRS Hydra riser combo mount
en.description: HYDRA is the first dual optic mount designed for end users that offers a 2.91 inch Optic Centerline for faster target ID, regardless of gear/ equipment obstructions, ie. EarPro/Comms headsets, Gas masks/ CBRN, and Night vision use.

en.name: GBRS Hydra riser combo mount (FDE)
en.description: HYDRA is the first dual optic mount designed for end users that offers a 2.91 inch Optic Centerline for faster target ID, regardless of gear/ equipment obstructions, ie. EarPro/Comms headsets, Gas masks/ CBRN, and Night vision use.

en.name: Unity Tactical FAST LPVO 30mm ring scope mount
en.description: Creating a 2.05” optical centerline from the rail, the FAST™ LPVO scope mount is the perfect solution for deploying low power variable optics on the modern battlefield.

en.name: Geissele 34mm Super Precision top ring cap
en.description: A regular 34mm top ring cap for the Geissele Super Precision mounts.

en.name: Geissele 34mm Super Precision top ring cap (DDC)
en.description: A regular 34mm top ring cap for the Geissele Super Precision mounts. Desert Dirt Color version.

en.name: Geissele Super Precision 34mm ring scope mount
en.description: A universal 34mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Geissele.

en.name: Geissele Super Precision 34mm ring scope mount (DDC)
en.description: A universal 34mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Geissele. Desert Dirt Color version.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-90 RMR mount for Geissele scope mounts
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Geissele scope mount series. Replaces the standard Geissele top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-90 RMR mount for Geissele scope mounts (DDC)
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Geissele scope mount series. Replaces the standard Geissele top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-45 RMR mount for Geissele scope mounts
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-45 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Geissele scope mount series. Replaces the standard Geissele top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-45 RMR mount for Geissele scope mounts (DDC)
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-45 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Geissele scope mount series. Replaces the standard Geissele top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia 2.5mm RMR Riser for Trijicon RMR
en.description: The Reptilia® ROF Riser is an add-on plate for our ROF line. It moves the mounted red dot sight 2.5mm OR 10mm further from the host scope’s centerline, providing extra clearance for tall turrets or larger-belled scope bodies.

en.name: Reptilia 2.5mm RMR Riser for Trijicon RMR (DDC)
en.description: The Reptilia® ROF Riser is an add-on plate for our ROF line. It moves the mounted red dot sight 2.5mm OR 10mm further from the host scope’s centerline, providing extra clearance for tall turrets or larger-belled scope bodies.

en.name: Reptilia 10mm RMR Riser for Trijicon RMR
en.description: The Reptilia® ROF Riser is an add-on plate for our ROF line. It moves the mounted red dot sight 2.5mm OR 10mm further from the host scope’s centerline, providing extra clearance for tall turrets or larger-belled scope bodies.

en.name: Reptilia 10mm RMR Riser for Trijicon RMR (DDC)
en.description: The Reptilia® ROF Riser is an add-on plate for our ROF line. It moves the mounted red dot sight 2.5mm OR 10mm further from the host scope’s centerline, providing extra clearance for tall turrets or larger-belled scope bodies.

en.name: Trijicon MRO standard mount (short)
en.description: The standard mount base for MRO reflex sights, produced by Trijicon.

en.name: Trijicon MRO standard mount (tall)
en.description: The standard mount base for MRO reflex sights, produced by Trijicon.

en.name: Geissele Super Precision T1 Lower 1/3 Co-Witness mount (Black)
en.description: The Super Precision T1 Series was developed specifically to work with the Aimpoint T1 and similarly mounted red dot optics. These mounts are precision machined from a single piece of 7075-T6 high strength aluminum and are available in absolute co-witness, lower third co-witness and 1.93" height options.

en.name: Geissele Super Precision T1 Lower 1/3 Co-Witness mount (FDE)
en.description: The Super Precision T1 Series was developed specifically to work with the Aimpoint T1 and similarly mounted red dot optics. These mounts are precision machined from a single piece of 7075-T6 high strength aluminum and are available in absolute co-witness, lower third co-witness and 1.93" height options.

en.name: Geissele Super Precision T1 Absolute Co-Witness mount (Black)
en.description: The Super Precision T1 Series was developed specifically to work with the Aimpoint T1 and similarly mounted red dot optics. These mounts are precision machined from a single piece of 7075-T6 high strength aluminum and are available in absolute co-witness, lower third co-witness and 1.93" height options.

en.name: Geissele Super Precision T1 Absolute Co-Witness mount (FDE)
en.description: The Super Precision T1 Series was developed specifically to work with the Aimpoint T1 and similarly mounted red dot optics. These mounts are precision machined from a single piece of 7075-T6 high strength aluminum and are available in absolute co-witness, lower third co-witness and 1.93" height options.

en.name: Trijicon TA44 sight mount
en.description: The TA44 universal mount for installation of the Trijicon 1.5x16 sight.

en.name: KAC Aimpoint Micro NVG riser mount
en.description: Aimpoint Micro NVG High Rise Mount By lifting the optic up higher you can clear lights, lasers and any other items that can obstruct your sight picture. Intended to be used with Eotech or Aimpoint magnifiers on the rearward rail.

en.name: KAC Aimpoint Micro NVG riser mount (Reversed)
en.description: Aimpoint Micro NVG High Rise Mount By lifting the optic up higher you can clear lights, lasers and any other items that can obstruct your sight picture. Intended to be used with Eotech or Aimpoint magnifiers on the rearward rail.

en.name: Unity FAST Optic Riser (BLK)
en.description: The FAST™ Optic Riser securely elevates direct-to-rail mounted red dot optics with a standard lower 1/3 co-witness picatinny mount to a 2.26″ optical center line. The FAST™ Optic Riser provides an elevated M1913 Picatinny platform for direct attachment of optics, such as EOTech® EXPS, Vortex® UH-1 and other lower 1/3 co-witness optics. It can be paired with any FAST™ FTC (Flip-to-Center) magnifier mount.

en.name: Unity FAST Optic Riser (FDE)
en.description: The FAST™ Optic Riser securely elevates direct-to-rail mounted red dot optics with a standard lower 1/3 co-witness picatinny mount to a 2.26″ optical center line. The FAST™ Optic Riser provides an elevated M1913 Picatinny platform for direct attachment of optics, such as EOTech® EXPS, Vortex® UH-1 and other lower 1/3 co-witness optics. It can be paired with any FAST™ FTC (Flip-to-Center) magnifier mount.

en.name: Reptilia AUS 34mm ring scope mount (FDE)
en.description: Introducing the AUS Mount for 34mm diameter magnified optics, from Reptilia. Driven by the request of an end user group, the AUS Mount is the culmination of a 2 year development program.

en.name: Reptilia AUS 34mm ring scope mount (BLK)
en.description: Introducing the AUS Mount for 34mm diameter magnified optics, from Reptilia. Driven by the request of an end user group, the AUS Mount is the culmination of a 2 year development program.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-90 RMR mount for Reptilia scope mounts (BLK)
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Reptilia AUS scope mount series. Replaces the standard Reptilia top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-90 RMR mount for Reptilia scope mounts (FDE)
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the Reptilia AUS scope mount series. Replaces the standard Reptilia top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia AUS 34mm top ring cap (BLK)
en.description: A regular 34mm top ring cap for the Reptilia AUS mounts.

en.name: Reptilia AUS 34mm top ring cap (FDE)
en.description: A regular 34mm top ring cap for the Reptilia AUS mounts.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-90 ACRO mount for Reptilia scope mounts (BLK)
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Aimpoint ACRO reflex sight on the Reptilia AUS scope mount series. Replaces the standard Reptilia top ring caps.

en.name: Reptilia 34mm ROF-90 ACRO mount for Reptilia scope mounts (FDE)
en.description: The Reptilia ROF-90 mount allows installation of the Aimpoint ACRO reflex sight on the Reptilia AUS scope mount series. Replaces the standard Reptilia top ring caps.

en.name: B&T QD low mount for Aimpoint ACRO
en.description: The Brugger & Thomet QD NAR is a special mount for the Aimpoint ACRO-series reflex sights. low height version.

en.name: Larue LT724 Angled CQB Micro T-1 mount
en.description: Magnified scopes are great for distance targets, but are slow and awkward when engaging targets close-in. When used in combination with a magnified scope, the LT-724 positions the excellent Aimpoint T-1 off to the side, so you'll have all the benefits of a red-dot simply by rotating the rifle a few degrees for rapid transition to close-range targets.
